title: Here’s Proof Hate Speech Is More Viral on Elon Musk’s Twitter
description: Researchers monitoring a “firehose” of public tweets found signs of increasing toxicity—before Elon Musk reversed bans on Trump and other divisive figures.

title: The Race To Save Sam Bankman-Fried’s Other Crypto Exchange
description: Following the collapse of FTX, a group of volunteers has gathered to try and salvage Serum. But the work is far from straightforward.
